item.title: Hugo
item.description: Get Started Create new site: hugo new site <name> cd <name> Download required them into themes folder: You can choose to create git submodule or clone the theme git clone/sub module http://theme-from-github into themes/<name> Update config.yaml to choose the downloaded theme. theme:<name> Start hugo server: hugo server Create Content All your site content resides in folder content/ hugo new <name>.md Each content file created will have metadata associated known as frontmatter.
